pollInterval: Query interval overview of hours (every hour on the hour)
maxDistance: Maximum distance to the weather station
pollIntervalCurrently: Query Interval for current weather (in minutes)
pollIntervalRadar: Query interval for radar data (in minutes, must be divisible by 5)
radarDistance: Radar search area radius (data extends this distance to each side from center, max 50km)
wmo_station: WMO station ID (optional, default is empty)
dwd_station_id: DWD station ID (optional, default is empty)
statictext1: If something is entered in one of the station options, this overwrites the lat,lon and distance information. You can enter a comma-separated list without spaces (the IDs have 5 digits, add a 0 at the beginning if necessary).
